pkgmetadata.longdescription: Small Area Estimation for Continuous Zero Inflated Data // Simplifies the process of fitting a zero-inflated estimator onto a dataset. This estimator is a combination of a linear mixed effects regression model and a logistic mixed effects regression model which is summarized by White and others (2024, arXiv:2402.03263). The variance is estimated through a parametric bootstrapping method which is given by Chandra and others (2012, doi:10.1080/03610918.2011.598991).
